title: Cloud Network Architect / Engineer till IT avdelningen i Stockholm
description:
****Brinner du för nätverk och cloud? Vill du arbeta i en händelserik miljö och vara med och utforma framtiden inom nätverk? Då vill vi höra från dig!****
****Vi vill satsa på området och söker därför flera personer till vårt Cloud Infrastructure Team.****
**Om tjänsten**
 Som Cloud Network Architect/Engineer kommer du att vara med och driva arbetet inom nätverk framåt, Ving befinner sig i en stor transformationsresa in i molnet och här blir du en viktig del. I rollen kommer du att ha en framåtblick och omvärldsbevaka ny teknik samtidigt som du arbetar hands-on med allt från att implementera lösningar till att supportera utvecklingsteam gällande nätverksfrågor.
   

  

 Du kommer ingå i teamet Technology Services som ansvarar för ett modernt private cloud-datacenter byggt på Microsoft-teknologi, Azure public cloud-lösningar med tyngden på SaaS och PaaS lösningar. Teamet strävar efter att ständigt förbättras och du kommer ges stora möjligheter till personlig utveckling.
   

  

 Som Cloud Network Architect/Engineer kommer du att arbeta med att ta fram och driva roadmap för nätverk samt implementera och underhålla lösningar i både Azure och Onprem miljöer. Detta kommer bland annat innebära att:
   

  

  

* Designa, standardisera, underhålla och leverera nätverks plattformar i molnet och on-prem
* Vara drivande i arbetet inom arktiektur och roadmap för nätverk och i vår molnresa
* Samarbeta nära med tvärfunktionella team för att anpassa nätverkslösningar utifrån verksamhetens behov.
* Felsökning och problemlösning av tjänster och implementering av nya lösningar
* Guida och supportera verksamhet och utvecklingsteam i nätverksrelaterade frågor


**Vem vi söker** 
**Vi önskar att du uppfyller följande punkter:**
* Högskoleutbildning inom IT eller motsvarande kunskap genom arbetslivserfarenhet
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet inom IT fokuserade på molnlösningar och arkitektur, företrädesvis med Microsoft Azure
* Kunskap om Microsofts teknologistack för både privata och offentliga molntjänster
* Kunskap inom Azure Networking, Data centre network, SD-WAN, Network Security


**Det är meriterande om du även:**
* Är certifierad inom IT arkitektur (ex. TOGAF, COBIT)
* Har kunskap inom Infrastructure as Code (IaC), ARM/Bicep, automatisering
* Har erfarenhet av att arbeta agilt


 Vi söker dig som har sinne för struktur, är noggrann och analytisk. Du tar självständiga initiativ och är en analytisk problemlösare som har förmågan att se saker ur ett helhetsperspektiv och förstå samband mellan detalj och helhet. Du är bra på problemlösning och har lätt att knyta relationer för goda samarbeten. Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
   

  

****Vi erbjuder****
 Vi erbjuder en spännande och utvecklande miljö där du får möjlighet till en intern karriär. Du får en omväxlande vardag tillsammans med härliga kollegor - vi arbetar i nära samarbete mellan de nordiska länderna för att ge våra gäster de bästa veckorna på året. Vi har dessutom ett högt medarbetarengagemang som år efter år visar sig i vår interna medarbetarundersökning. Vi älskar vårt jobb och välkomnar dig ombord på vår resa i Nordic Leisure Travel Group!
   

  

****Ansökan****
 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan! Urval sker löpande, så vi välkomnar din ansökan så snart som möjligt. I den här rekryteringen samarbetar Ving med Boxhill AB. Vill du veta mer, kontakta gärna ansvarig rekryteringskonsult Petra Törnblom, petra.tornblom@bhill.se
   

  

 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  

**🏄‍♂️ Kul på jobbet**
**🤝 Tjänstepension**
**🌎 Reseförmåner**
**🦉 Utveckling och lärande**
**💗 Well-being**
**💼 Hybrid arbetsplats**
 Läs mer om vad vi erbjuder här
   

  

 Ving ingår i den nordiska resekoncernenNordic Leisure Travel Group.
   

  

 I gruppen ingår researrangörerna Ving Sverige, Ving Norge, Globetrotter, Spies i Danmark, Tjäreborg i Finland, flygbolaget Sunclass Airlines samt våra egna hotellkoncept Sunwing Family Resorts, Ocean Beach Club och Sunprime Hotels. Gruppen säljer ett normalt år runt 1 500 000 resor i de nordiska länderna.
   

  

 Arbetsområde
   

  

 IT
   

  

 Roll: Technology Services
   

  

 Platser: Stockholm
   

  

 Distansarbete: Hybridarbete
   

  

 Anställningsform: Heltid
   

  

 Startdatum
   

  

 Enligt överenskommelse
   

  

 Kontaktperson: Henrik Eriksson, henrik.eriksson@nltg.com Skicka ansökan

title: Digital & Software Manager
description:
**Shape the Future with Siemens: Drive Digital Transformation in Sustainable Infrastructure**
 At Siemens, we’re not just imagining the future—we’re building it by combining the real and digital worlds. As a global leader in sustainable infrastructure, we’re transforming cities, industries, and societies to improve the lives of billions. Technology holds the key to solving the greatest challenges of our time, and we believe it’s our responsibility to lead the way.
   

  

 Now, we’re looking for bold, visionary leaders ready to drive digital transformation in the Buildings Business Unit.
   

  

**Your Impact**
 As the
 **Digital & Software Manager,** 
 you will be instrumental in leading digital innovation and software transformation for Siemens’ smart infrastructure projects. This role will challenge you to shape the future of smarter, self-adaptive, and autonomous buildings across a variety of industries. By leveraging Artificial Intelligence, IT/OT convergence, and digital services, you will help customers meet their sustainability goals, reduce emissions, and optimize their operations.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Comprehensive Strategy Development: Develop, drive, and execute comprehensive business and go-to-market strategies to identify and target customers for Siemens' software and digital offerings across multiple sectors.
* Sales Strategy Innovation: Design and implement new sales strategies for cloud-based, SaaS, and AI-driven technology solutions, including the development of KPIs, tooling reviews, and sales success dashboarding.
* Product & Portfolio Improvement: Continuously drive the improvement of Siemens' product, solution, and service portfolio, using new technologies and industry trends to stay ahead of market demands.
* Customer Engagement & Success Management: Inspire and influence customers with tailored digital solutions, acting as a trusted innovation partner, while ensuring long-term customer satisfaction through post-sale engagement.
* Cross-functional Collaboration: Work closely with product development, engineering, and marketing teams to ensure the seamless alignment of digital solutions with broader business objectives and customer needs.
* Pipeline Management: Create a comprehensive customer targeting plan and maintain a robust sales pipeline to efficiently identify, qualify, and convert leads into long-term business opportunities.
* Market Analysis & Competitive Intelligence: Conduct ongoing market and competitor analysis to keep Siemens’ offerings competitive, relevant, and aligned with emerging customer needs.
* Partnership Development: Develop and execute a digital partnership strategy to foster collaborations with technology providers and expand Siemens' digital ecosystem, ensuring all channels are effectively supported.
* Mentorship & Team Development: Provide training and mentorship to the sales team, enhancing their digital product knowledge and optimizing their go-to-market strategies using the latest digital tools.
* Budget & Resource Management: Oversee budget allocation and resource planning, ensuring efficient project delivery and maximizing return on investment (ROI).
* Risk Management: Identify potential risks in the digital transformation strategy and take proactive steps to mitigate them, ensuring business continuity and cybersecurity resilience.


**Your Key Success Factors**
* A results-driven leader with a proven track record in developing and executing digital and software sales strategies that drive growth.
* Extensive experience in leading sales and business development within the technology sector, with a focus on software and digital transformation.
* Strong interest and expertise in emerging technologies such as AI, IoT, and digital platforms to enhance consumer experiences and transform business models.
* Demonstrated ability to meet and exceed digital and software sales targets while building and developing a high-performing, motivated team.
* Comprehensive knowledge of the IoT, cloud, and software industries, coupled with a passion for using digital technologies to drive innovation and business success.
* Experience in strategy consulting, IT, software, and cloud platforms, with strong influencing, networking, and stakeholder management skills.
* Proven ability to work collaboratively across functions to ensure the seamless delivery of customer-centric digital initiatives.
* Strong project management skills, with the ability to lead large-scale digital initiatives from conception through to execution.
* Knowledge of cybersecurity best practices and industry standards to ensure solutions are secure and resilient.


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Exceptional leadership skills with a proven ability to inspire, motivate, and develop high-performing teams.
* Strong networks and connections within the Nordic market, with established relationships among existing and potential customers, as well as the broader technology sector.
* Excellent communication and relationship-building skills, with the ability to engage and influence stakeholders at all levels within an organization.
* Proficiency in CRM tools and digital sales platforms, along with experience using marketing automation tools to support the sales process.
* Fluent communication skills in English, and proficiency in one or more Nordic languages (Swedish, Finnish, Norwegian, Danish).


**Why Siemens?**
 At Siemens, diversity and inclusion are at the heart of our values. We believe that diverse perspectives drive innovation, and we’re committed to building an inclusive workplace where everyone can thrive. Here, you’ll have the opportunity to lead a global business while working with cutting-edge technology that shapes the future of sustainable infrastructure.
   

  

**Join Us Today**
 Be part of a team that’s transforming the way we live and work. Apply by 5th of November to start your journey toward creating smarter, greener, more autonomous buildings.
   

  

 For questions about the role, please contact Mithra Pakdaman Kiasat at mithra.kiasat@siemens.com. For questions about the recruitment process, reach out to our Talent Acquisition Partner, Outi Mäkinen, at outi.makinen@siemens.com.
   

  

 We look forward to your application!
   

  

 This role can be based in any of the Nordic countries.

title: Senior Solution Architect- (Sales Engineering/Presales)
description:
At Optimizely, we're on a mission to help people unlock their digital potential. We do that by reinventing how marketing and product teams work to create and optimize digital experiences across all channels. With Optimizely One, our industry-first operating system for marketers, we offer teams flexibility and choice to build their stack their way with our fully SaaS, fully decoupled, and highly composable solution.
   

  

 We are proud to help more than 10,000 businesses, including H&M, PayPal, Zoom, and Toyota, enrich their customer lifetime value, increase revenue and grow their brands. Our innovation and excellence have earned us numerous recognitions as a leader by industry analysts such as Gartner, Forrester, and IDC, reinforcing our role as a trailblazer in MarTech.
   

  

 At our core, we believe work is about more than just numbers -- it's about the people. Our culture is dynamic and constantly evolving, shaped by every employee, their actions and their stories. With over 1500 Optimizers spread across 12 global locations, our diverse team embodies the "One Optimizely" spirit, emphasizing collaboration and continuous improvement, while fostering a culture where every voice is heard and valued.
   

  

 Join us and become part of a company that's empowering people to unlock their digital potential!
   

  

 To get a sneak peek into our culture, find us on Instagram: @optimizely
   

  

**Introduction**
 Energetic, outgoing and passionate about technology, the Senior Solution Architect role combines detailed technical knowledge with a dedication to the sales process and customer success. The Solution Architect will support sales productivity, partner enablement, and customer evaluations by collaborating closely with product and technical teams to highlight the many ways Optimizely solutions meet customer needs.
   

  

**Job Responsibilities**
* Work as a collaborative member of our sales team in a pre-sales capacity
* Act as an Optimizely product expert for the entire Optimizely platform
* Develop relationships with customers/partners and seek to understand challenges, pain points, goals, and criteria for a successful web solution
* Prepare and conduct discovery workshops, discussions, and value-based use case demonstrations along with sales team for prospects, customers, and partners
* Define and successfully implement Proof of Concept (POC) projects where applicable
* Assist in responses to proposals and general Q&A from a business value-add and technical capacity
* Maintain highest level of technical and market knowledge; create thought leadership through writing, user group presentations, and Optimizely community involvement
* Fluent in Swedish and English


**Knowledge And Experience**
* Higher education within Computer Science, Information Technology preferred.
* Experience with digital marketing, content management and e-commerce.
* 3 years of experience from web development, information architecture, and related concepts and technologies.
* Development experience in React, Next.js or similar framework.
* Interest in learning new products, technologies, and industry trends.
* Strong verbal and written communication skills, with an ability to articulate key messages clearly and explain technical concepts to a non-technical audience.
* Comfortable presenting to audiences including resources from all levels of organization: business, IT, C-level.
* Excellent time and task management skills with ability to prioritize and adapt to re-prioritization as necessary.
* Results oriented team player with a commitment to quality of product and service.
* Self-motivated and creative with a natural drive to learn and pick up new challenges.
* Comfortable leading meetings to discuss and discover technical requirements.


**Education**
 Master's of Science or Business Administration preferred or equivalent work experience. Computer Science background preffered.
   

  

 Optimizely is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace. Optimizely is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, protected veteran status, disability, age, or other legally protected status.

title: Customer Success Account Manager
description:
***This job is with Microsoft, an inclusive employer and a member of myGwork – the largest global platform for the LGBTQ+ business community. Please do not contact the recruiter directly.***
**Overview**
 Microsoft is on a mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. Our culture is centered on embracing a growth mindset, a theme of inspiring excellence, and encouraging teams and leaders to bring their best each day. In doing so, we create life-changing innovations that impact billions of lives around the world. You can help us to achieve our mission.
   

  

 Microsoft aspires to help our customers achieve their own digital transformation, leveraging the power of Microsoft Cloud solutions and support offerings. To this end, Microsoft invests in a dedicated Customer Success team that will help Microsoft customers successfully realize their business outcomes.
   

  

 We are looking for a senior customer facing role -Principal Customer Success Account Manager responsible for customer success through the management of program deliveries and strong customer executive relationships at our largest, most complex global strategic customers. The prevailing business priority is the customers’ successful adoption and productive use of Microsoft cloud technologies. This role will be front and center with our customers in support of their digital journey and empowering them to achieve more.
   

  

 The Principal CSAM provides delivery leadership, for our largest and most complex accounts, focused on ensuring delivery is driving the customer’s success and consistently achieving our shared objectives and outcomes. They will oversee and ensure prioritized alignment of coordinated outcomes across Customer Success Engagements and Support Programs that will drive customer business outcomes, cloud consumption, supportability, and operational health
   

  

**Qualifications**
**Experiences Required:**
* Business ownership and growth-oriented mindset, ability to drive predictable delivery business within portfolio.
* Success in complex engagement management and/or program management required. Prior work experience in a Program Manager or Engagement Manager position focused on Cloud and software/services solution.
* Experience with a global enterprise environment with an understanding of corporate customer support needs.
* Self-driven problem-solving attitude and a curious mind, willing to learn more and help
* Thriving in the fast-paced matrix managed environment.
* Relationship Building - Proven track record of building relationships with senior customer executives in large or highly strategic accounts. Experience in managing various stakeholder relationships to get consensus on solutions/engagements required.
* Collaboration and Communication- Proven track record of driving decisions collaboratively, resolving conflicts, and ensuring follow-through with verbal and written communication. Strong presentation skills with a high degree of comfort with both large and small audiences and various levels of management (Business Owners, Senior Executives, IT management, Database administrators and Data Scientist).
* BSc/MSc degree, including Computer Science/Engineering, Microsoft technology knowledge preferred.
* Technical- Experience with Azure cloud and hybrid infrastructures, architecture designs, and migrations preferred. Knowledge of market trends and competitive insights preferred. Understanding of partner ecosystems and the ability to leverage partner solutions to solve customer needs preferred.
* Excellent Swedish and English language skills.


 Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application or the recruiting process, please send a request via the Accommodation request form.
   

  

 Benefits/perks listed below may vary depending on the nature of your employment with Microsoft and the country where you work.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Provides Delivery Leadership - Leads a virtual team of CSAM’s and the overall global account support and success team to ensure the health of the customer’s solutions, orchestrated prioritized modernization and transformation projects, which lead to customer outcomes.
* Engages Customer Executive Sponsors - Establishes and nurtures strong executive sponsorship and manages the relationships with customer leadership to drive the execution of the support coverage model, strategic account plan, consumption roadmap & delivery execution oversight.
* Accountable for the Customer Success Cloud Consumption Planning and Execution - Aligns the strategic account planning and cross-organization support coverage to drive consumption planning and success engagement execution aligned to the desired customer outcomes. Accountable for the development and execution of the internal and customer-facing aspects cross-cloud consumption plan, with support from the technical resources aligned to the account. Ensures prioritized Success Engagements progress from Validate through Commit with a Program Delivery plan and up-to-date milestones. Alignment of resources to drive prioritized customer solutions, this in line with account plan.
* Leverage technology experience - Is experienced with real-world, hands-on experience designing, developing, deploying, and supporting large technology solutions. Knowledgeable and experienced in creating solutions that leverage cloud technologies and that provide maximum business value, which sustain the test of time.
* Engages Microsoft Executive Sponsors - Aligns with Microsoft Executive Sponsors to establish an engagement model and manage the communication & escalation strategies with customer leadership.

title: System Sr Sales Rep
description:
**Job Description**
 We are looking for someone who is looking for an overall sales responsibility for a sales territory in Sweden with a mix of large public and private customers. She or he should own the full sales responsibility from a systems point of view and develop this territory. Understanding off Private Cloud and hardware technology and how to create compelling business cases is highly desirable to be able to position our sales across the full Systems portfolio of products.
   

  

**What you’ll bring:**
* Possess a good high-level understanding of server, storage, services, associated Software, and how superior solutions can brings value for our customers.
* A self-motivated team player who excels at cultivating strategic relationships on all levels while developing new business within the given territory.
* Responsible and accountable for growth, value, strategy, customer satisfaction, through relationship management, cross-selling, innovation, thought leadership and financial management.
* Generate and achieve weekly territory forecasts, and accurately predict revenue monthly; manages escalation
* Assist in the development of short-, medium-, and long-term plans to achieve strategic objectives
* The ability to influence thinking or gain acceptance of others in sensitive situations is important.
* Language skills: Swedish and English.


 Career Level - IC4
   

  

**Responsibilities**
**Responsibilities:**
* Works towards an allocated Hardware target
* Driving sales through the entire sales cycle, from demand generation programs through to closed business and Partners’ and Customers’ references
* Maintaining a deep understanding of the market and identifying and prioritizing the key opportunities for Oracle within that market
* Manage the sales process for establishing market visibility and deal visibility.
* Manages opportunities to obtain appropriate and necessary resources for all qualified opportunities.


**About Us**
 As a world leader in cloud solutions, Oracle uses tomorrow’s technology to tackle today’s problems. True innovation starts with diverse perspectives and various abilities and backgrounds.
   

  

 When everyone’s voice is heard, we’re inspired to go beyond what’s been done before. It’s why we’re committed to expanding our inclusive workforce that promotes diverse insights and perspectives.
   

  

 We’ve partnered with industry-leaders in almost every sector—and continue to thrive after 40+ years of change by operating with integrity.
   

  

 Oracle careers open the door to global opportunities where work-life balance flourishes. We offer a highly competitive suite of employee benefits designed on the principles of parity and consistency. We put our people first with flexible medical, life insurance and retirement options. We also encourage employees to give back to their communities through our volunteer programs.
   

  

 We’re committed to including people with disabilities at all stages of the employment process. If you require accessibility assistance or accommodation for a disability at any point, let us know by calling +1 888 404 2494, option one.
   

  

**Disclaimer:**
 Oracle is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer\*. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability and protected veterans’ status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Oracle will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records pursuant to applicable law.
   

  

* Which includes being a United States Affirmative Action Employer

title: Sales Development Representative
description:
**FICO (NYSE: FICO)** 
 is a leading global analytics software company, helping businesses in 100+ countries make better decisions. Join our world-class team today and fulfill your career potential!
   

  

**The Opportunity**
*"The Sales Development Executive role provides an exciting platform for career development for sales-oriented, ambitious, hungry individuals who have a creative & entrepreneurial flair, along with highly developed communication skills. You’ll play a strategic role in the company’s continued growth by finding and breaking into the next premier customers for FICOs flagship cloud software products. Experience of working in a fast-paced commercial environment is essential. Previous sales experience is desirable. The ability to develop relationships, drive, and ambition the key skills required.”* 
 – Sales Development, Director.
   

  

**What You’ll Contribute**
* Prospect and contact key decision makers in a focused number of medium and large sized businesses within Financial Services and generate interest in FICO solutions specifically within the Nordics.
* Generate new business opportunities through prospecting into Financial Services in the assigned region (Nordics & Benelux).
* Contact, research, educate and qualify inbound and outbound leads to generate qualified sales opportunities within the Nordic region.
* Cultivate a strong pipeline by following up, qualify and convert marketing leads into sales-ready meetings and opportunities for Key Account Managers.
* Effectively and efficiently log all interactions and leads in Salesforce.
* Interact frequently with assigned territory sales team to ensure they stay engaged.
* Focus on customer by understanding their industry, business, pain points and challenges and have a consultive approach towards prospects.
* Develop extensive solution knowledge to provide detailed insight to prospects.
* Partner with Field Marketing team to provide immediate campaign feedback and input on future campaigns.
* Identify target messaging and qualification improvements as required for overall sales development program effectiveness.


**What We’re Seeking**
* Fluency in Swedish and English with excellent communication skills.
* Business experience, preferably results oriented or sales environment.
* Ability to perform individually and as part of a high performing team.
* High energy, you’re passionate and you enjoy being challenged.
* Effective problem-solving and time management skills.
* Proficient in MS Office Suite.
* Experience with Salesforce or similar CRM applications is a plus.
* Educated to degree standard, or have gained the same level of experience operating in a commercial environment.
* Experience in a technology company or prospecting/selling into the technology industry.
* Understanding of broad business dynamics and how large, complex companies operate.
* Strong capacity to develop relationships quickly over the phone, through email, and social channels.
* The ability to think strategically, critically, and leverage data in making decisions.
* Detailed, motivated self- starter who thrives on working in complex and challenging environments of a rapidly evolving business.
* Experience in Inside Sales, Sales Development, or Business Development is desirable but not essential.
* Experience working within the Benelux region is desirable but not essential.
* Experience within the financial services sector is desirable but not essential.
* Tools and technology: Salesforce.com, Microsoft is desirable but not essential.


**Our Offer to You**
* An inclusive culture strongly reflecting our core values: Act Like an Owner, Delight Our Customers and Earn the Respect of Others.
* The opportunity to make an impact and develop professionally by leveraging your unique strengths and participating in valuable learning experiences.
* Highly competitive compensation, benefits and rewards programs that encourage you to bring your best every day and be recognized for doing so.
* An engaging, people-first work environment offering work/life balance, employee resource groups, and social events to promote interaction and camaraderie.


**Why Make a Move to FICO?**
 At FICO, you can develop your career with a leading organization in one of the fastest-growing fields in technology today – Big Data analytics. You’ll play a part in our commitment to help businesses use data to improve every choice they make, using advances in artificial intelligence, machine learning, optimization, and much more.
   

  

 FICO makes a real difference in the way businesses operate worldwide:
   

  

* Credit Scoring — FICO® Scores are used by 90 of the top 100 US lenders.
* Fraud Detection and Security — 4 billion payment cards globally are protected by FICO fraud systems.
* Lending — 3/4 of US mortgages are approved using the FICO Score.


 Global trends toward digital transformation have created tremendous demand for FICO’s solutions, placing us among the world’s top 100 software companies by revenue. We help many of the world’s largest banks, insurers, retailers, telecommunications providers and other firms reach a new level of success. Our success is dependent on really talented people – just like you – who thrive on the collaboration and innovation that’s nurtured by a diverse and inclusive environment. We’ll provide the support you need, while ensuring you have the freedom to develop your skills and grow your career. Join FICO and help change the way business thinks!
   

  

 Learn more about how you can fulfil your potential at www.fico.com/Careers
   

  

 FICO promotes a culture of inclusion and seeks to attract a diverse set of candidates for each job opportunity. We are an equal employment opportunity employer and we’re proud to offer employment and advancement opportunities to all candidates without regard to race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, pregnancy, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. Research has shown that women and candidates from underrepresented communities may not apply for an opportunity if they don’t meet all stated qualifications. While our qualifications are clearly related to role success, each candidate’s profile is unique and strengths in certain skill and/or experience areas can be equally effective. If you believe you have many, but not necessarily all, of the stated qualifications we encourage you to apply.
   

  

 Information submitted with your application is subject to the FICO Privacy policy at https://www.fico.com/en/privacy-policy

title: Analytics Engineer
description:
**About Us**
 In 2022, Instabee was founded after combining Budbee and Instabox - two leading last-mile delivery companies with three consumer-facing brands: Budbee, Instabox, and Porterbuddy. Instabee serves millions of consumers across Europe with convenient deliveries and is on track to become the leading European e-commerce enabler. Always with the consumer at heart.
   

  

 We’re fast, both in terms of parcel delivery and when it comes to growing our business. So far our journey has taken us from Sweden to the rest of Scandinavia and parts of continental Europe, but we have no plans on stopping anytime soon. As we continue to expand, the complexity of Instabee grows in parallel. With that in mind, we’re now looking for a Analytics Engineer to help on the journey ahead!
   

  

**About The Team**
 The Business Intelligence team has 2 main roles in play, Analytics Engineer and Data Analyst. We have developed a comprehensive way of working for ourselves and our stakeholders and build our solutions on the modern data stack using FiveTran, Python, DBT and Snowflake for data ingestion, storage and modeling with Tableau as our primary data visualization product.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
 Within the Business Intelligence team, you will get the opportunity to shape how Instabee builds its analytical data layers which serve everyone in our organization and enable us to make better decisions. The data warehouse is a key asset that we use for multiple data processing purposes while traditional BI is one use case we deploy, we also service data science investigations and create endpoints for our technology teams to use in our products and services.
   

  

**Why an Analytics Engineer**
 The intersection of data analysis and engineering has seen the emergence of the Analytics Engineer where data ingestion is a solved problem thanks to SaaS products and easier programmatic integration patterns, and the value focus is on data modeling in SQL and building actionable data models for multiple use cases.
   

  

**As An Analytics Engineer, You Will Cover**
* Design and build data models that support business processes, where governance and trust in data are critical
* Be an expert in data transformation techniques using SQL and here at Instabee we use DBT to automate this as well as Python
* Work on analytical projects to help answer a hypothesis or solve an idea a stakeholder might have
* Demonstrate an appetite to try new approaches, staying up to date with market trends and advances in data processing
* Be comfortable promoting your work both internally and externally


*We think you are a person who...*
* Will have experience from a Data Analyst, Data Engineering or Data Scientist role
* A university degree in an analytical field (e.g. Mathematics, Computer Science, Physics)
* Has strong knowledge of SQL and command of analytical functions
* Understands data modeling techniques and their value in delivering end user self-service
* Has good programming skills (Python, Go)
* Is able to use a data visualization and methodical approach to communicate your analytical findings
* Understands the value of modern cloud computing and SaaS tools we have in play at Instabee (FiveTran, Snowflake, DBT, Tableau, Python)


**What We Offer**
 The chance to be part of something truly amazing and revolutionizing the logistics industry with new product offerings and exemplary service is what excites every employee working here today and we are still just getting started!
   

  

 If you’ve read this far there is clearly nothing stopping you from clicking the apply button.
   

  

 We look forward to meeting you.
   

  

**Benefits**
 Of course, we have all the necessary and standard benefits in place, but in addition to this, we can also offer:
   

  

 🌇 Sky-High Office: Modern and newly renovated with a 360-degree view around Stockholm.
   

  

 🐶 Puppy Friendly: Bring your dog to work - we've got a whole floor for our furry friends!
   

  

 🍸 Rooftop Fridays: Chill out at our Friday rooftop bar with the best views in town
   

  

 🥐 Wednesdays Tech Breakfasts: Fuel your midweek with tech talks and tasty bites.
   

  

 👾 Tech Demos: Dive into the latest innovations with our regular tech showcases.
   

  

 💻 Modern Tech Stack: Work with cutting-edge technology every day.
   

  

 🏓 Fun Games: Ping pong, Shuffleboard, Foosball, and even a Karaoke Room for your leisure time.
   

  

 ⏰ Flexible Hours: Hybrid setup with working hours that adapt to your lifestyle.
   

  

 👶 Parental Pay for Six Months: Step away from work and provide the best care
   

  

 and love to your little one.
   

  

 🎂 A Day Off on Your Birthday: We love to celebrate, so enjoy your birthday to the fullest with a day off each year!
   

  

 Diversity and inclusion is very important to us and we are committed to creating an inclusive work environment. We want to be a workplace where everyone’s perspectives and opinions are valued, and we are dedicated to creating opportunities for all employees to thrive and reach their full potential.
   

  

*This recruitment process consists of background checks via Verifiera as a review of previous public criminal records. The result is public information that is handled confidentially. This is mandatory for all recruitment processes at Instabee (Instabox/Budbee) in Sweden.*

title: Software Engineering Manager - SaaS (launchpad.net)
description:
Drive the future of collaborative open-source development tooling as part of the Launchpad team. This is an opportunity for a motivated engineering manager with a passion for open-source software, Linux, and web services to join our distributed team.
   

  

 Launchpad is a robust platform for managing open-source development projects. It includes code hosting and review, bug tracking, package building, translations, and other facilities used by free and open-source software developers. It provides essential development infrastructure for major projects such as Ubuntu.
   

  

 As an engineering manager at Canonical your primary responsibility is to the people you support: ensuring that they are growing as engineers, doing valuable work, and generally having a great time at Canonical. We're looking for technical leadership and a solid background in software development, so that you're able to challenge and grow your team members. You will have the opportunity to influence the culture, facilitate technical delivery, and work with your team on strategy and execution.
   

  

 Build a rewarding, meaningful career working with the best and brightest people in technology at Canonical, a growing international software company.
   

  

**What you'll do**
* Grow and lead a team of engineers in your region
* Develop talent through coaching, mentoring, feedback, and hands-on career development
* Apply sound engineering principles and directly contribute toward your team's goals
* Create and maintain productive relationships with stakeholders
* Set and manage expectations with other engineering teams, management, and external stakeholders
* Collaborate proactively with a distributed team and community
* Lead the ongoing development of Launchpad, the infrastructure on which great software like Ubuntu is built
* Advocate and advance modern, agile software development practices and help develop and evangelise great engineering and organisational practices
* Grow a healthy, collaborative engineering culture in line with the company values
* Actively engage with the broader leadership team
* Work from home with international travel up to 6 weeks per year for internal and external events


**Who you are**
* You have experience leading a distributed team to deliver features and manage production services at scale
* You love to mentor, develop, and grow people, and have an outstanding track record of doing so
* You are knowledgeable and passionate about technology
* You have experience delivering high quality software
* You have experience designing and evolving complex distributed systems
* You have effective written and verbal communication skills
* You have solid experience working in an agile development environment


**Location**
 This is a remote role based in the EMEA region. Candidates will be expected to be located within this region.
   

  

*We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. We truly believe that diversity of experience, perspectives, and background will lead to a better environment for our employees and a better platform for our users and customers. This is something we value deeply, and we encourage everyone to come be a part of the world of Ubuntu.*
 #stack

title: Senior IT-arkitekt till domänen Kund, Marknad & Mätning
description:
Om tjänsten
   

  

**Vill du vara med och accelerera vår digitalisering inom samhällskritisk verksamhet och bidra till ett fossilfritt liv inom en generation?** 
**Hos oss får du vara med och påverka morgondagens klimatsmarta samhälle och skapa framtidens elnät.**
 Vi på Vattenfall Eldistribution växer och just nu söker vi flera kompetenta medarbetare till vårt arkitekturteam.
   

  

 Du kommer att tillhöra en arkitekturfunktion med bred kompetens inom Enterprise, Verksamhets- IT- och Informationsarkitektur. Avdelningen för arkitektur består av ca 20 medarbetare och konsulter med uppgiften att styra, stötta och förvalta utformningen av bolagets arkitektur med fokus på och data/information, IT och Operational Technology (OT).
   

  

 Som IT-arkitekt hos oss kommer du att ha en central roll i att forma och driva vår långsiktiga IT-och digitaliseringsstrategi inom området Kund, Marknad & Mätning vilket innefattar livscykeln för vårt kundmöte, nätanslutning, marknadskontakter samt hela mätvärdesinsamlingen. Du kommer att arbeta med att bygga upp vår backend inom kund- marknad och mätområdet vilket innefattar allt från plattforms- och applikationsmodernisering, integration och interoperabilitet till att säkerställa arkitekturen vid tjänsteutvecklingen i frontend. Information och datakvalitetsfrågor kommer att vara en central del i arbetet. Arbetet innebär även ett nära samarbete med säkerhetsfunktionen och du kommer att ha många gränssnitt, intressenter och aktörer såväl externt som internt bl.a. till vår koncernövergripande IT (Vattenfall IT).
   

  

 Vi är inne i en förflyttning mot ett domändrivet och verksamhetsnära arkitekturarbete och du kommer tillsammans med övriga arkitekter i teamet att vara med och forma och etablera nya arbetssätt och metoder i nära samverkan med både verksamhet och IT.
   

  

 Exempel på arbetsuppgifter/ansvarsområden;
   

  

* Driva samskapande och förankring av vårt framtida IT-landskap i nära samarbete med IT och verksamheten
* Leda och bidra in i arbetet med att ta fram målarkitektur, roadmaps och arkitekturprinciper inom området för att säkerställa en effektiv portföljsstyrning.
* Delta i/stödja projekt, genomföra analyser och ta fram och kommunicera beslutsunderlag och arkitektur till olika målgrupper
* Tillsammans med övriga arkitekter och verksamheten säkerställa att arkitekturen är uppdaterad och hänger ihop
* Kompetensutveckling och omvärldsbevakning inom ditt område
* Delta i arbetet med att vidareutveckla gemensamma arkitekturmetoder och verktyg


 Din bakgrund
   

  

* Relevant utbildning från universitet eller högskola inom IT, datavetenskap eller motsvarande
* Erfarenhet av arkitekturarbete i roller som exempelvis Domänarkitekt, IT-arkitekt, Lösningsarkitekt och/eller Systemarkitekt
* Erfarenhet av webbplattformar, CMS-system, SAP, Microsoft dynamics, orkestrering av kundärenden etc.
* Du har erfarenhet av större IT-moderniserings- och datortransformationsprojekt i komplexa IT-miljöer gärna inom transaktionstung och säkerhetsklassad verksamhet.
* Erfarenhet av att ta fram beslutsunderlag, utveckla och kommunicera målarkitekturer samt roadmaps.
* Flytande svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift
* Erfarenhet och förmåga att tillämpa metoder och ramverk (SAFe, TOGAF etc) och arkitekturverktyg (vi använder oss av Sparx Enterprise Architect) för att skapa arkitektur som levererar kund- och verksamhetsnytta.
* Erfarenhet av data- och integrationstransformationer samt molnlösningar i hybridmiljö är meriterande


 Vi ser att du har kundfokus, är innovativ och har förmåga att se helheten. Du är bekväm i att leda och driva arkitekturarbete och har förmåga att balansera kort- och långsiktigt fokus. Du kommunicerar och visualiserar komplexa lösningar på̊ ett enkelt och lättillgängligt sätt, du är skicklig på att förankra och navigera i stora organisationer och visar ödmjukhet och respekt i samarbetet med andra. Du är också nyfiken och bra på att hålla dig à jour med vad som händer i ditt yrkesområde och i branschen. Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
   

  

 Mer information
   

  

*Förutom att du får vara med och forma framtidens smarta energisamhälle erbjuder vi dig ett utvecklande och omväxlande arbete med många kontaktytor. För oss på Vattenfall är det viktigt att arbete och privatliv har en god balans, därför erbjuder vi flexibilitet i arbetet samt möjlighet till att arbeta hemifrån vid behov. Vi har även en hel del andra personalförmåner som exempelvis arbetstidsförkortning, förmånliga tjänstepensionsavtal, föräldraledighetstillägg med mera. Läs mer om våra förmåner här.*
**Placeringsort**
 Solna, Trollhällan, Luleå
   

  

**För mer information** 
 om själva tjänsten kontakta rekryterande chef Jenny Brodin, jenny1.brodin@vattenfall.com. För frågor om rekryteringsprocessen kontakta rekryterare Julia Norberg, julia.norberg@vattenfall.com
   

  

**Välkommen med din ansökan senast 2024-11-17.** 
 Urval och intervjuer sker löpande. Vi tar endast emot ansökningar via vår webbplats.
   

  

 Fackliga representanter via Vattenfalls växel, 08 739 50 00. Akademikerna (SACO) – Sofi Wadström och Silvija Vatkovic, Ledarna – Christer Gustafsson, SEKO – Juha Siipilehto, Unionen – Inger Strandberg
   

  

 Vi är övertygade om att mångfald bidrar till att bygga ett mer lönsamt och tilltalande företag och strävar efter att vara goda förebilder när det gäller mångfald. Vattenfall arbetar aktivt för att alla medarbetare ska ha samma möjligheter och rättigheter oavsett ålder, etnisk eller kulturell bakgrund, könstillhörighet, religion/tro, sexuell läggning eller funktionsförutsättning. Läs mer om hur vi arbetar med mångfald och inkludering här.
   

  

 Då säkerheten för Vattenfall och dess anställda är avgörande kommer vi innan varje anställning genomföra en ”pre-employment screening”. Dessa kontroller baseras på din roll som du kommer att fylla inom Vattenfall.
   

  

 Vattenfall är en del av Sveriges kritiska infrastruktur, därmed är många av våra tjänster säkerhetsklassade. Är denna tjänst säkerhetsklassad kommer säkerhetsprövning genomföras innan anställning, i enlighet med säkerhetsskyddslagen.
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

 Om oss
   

  

 Vattenfall är en av Europas största producenter och återförsäljare av el och värme. Våra huvudmarknader är Sverige, Tyskland, Nederländerna, Danmark och Storbritannien. Inom Vattenfallkoncernen finns cirka 21 000 anställda. Vi har elektrifierat industrier, levererat energi till bostäder och förvandlat tillvaron genom innovation i över hundra års tid.

title: Innovativ Solution Architect
description:
**Beskrivning av tjänsten** 




 CGI söker en Innovativ Architect/Solution Architect
 



 Vi söker en erfaren Architect/Solution Architect med en unik förmåga att tänka utanför ramarna och driva affärsmöjligheter genom tekniska innovationer. I denna roll kommer du att ansvara för att skapa och implementera strategiska kundplaner och roadmaps, samtidigt som du genomför djupa analyser av kundmiljöer för att identifiera möjligheter till förbättring och tillämpning av ny teknologi. Du kommer att vara en central aktör i att driva innovationsprojekt och fungera som en rådgivare för våra kunder, med fokus på att skapa värde och öka deras konkurrenskraft.
 



 CGI är världsledande inom IT- och affärskonsulting. Vi hjälper våra kunder att lyckas med sina digitala transformationer och leverera mervärde till sina kunder. I CGI:s Business Unit Global Technology Operations (BU GTO) fokuserar vi på att leverera innovativa och skräddarsydda lösningar som möter våra kunders unika behov.
 



  





**Dina framtida arbetsuppgifter** 




 Du kommer att jobba som en del av lokal ledningsgrupp där vi tillsammans sätter agendan för kort och medium term med stor vikt på input från hela teamet för att tillvarata allas styrkor. Teamet består av ledare och Solution leads och enheten består av Engagement/Service Delivery Managers och Service Delivery Experts. Tillsammans levererar vi tjänster och konsulter till både internationella storbolag likväl som up and coming mindre bolag.
 



  





**Dina Ansvarsområden:** 



* Skapa och implementera strategiska kundplaner och roadmaps
* Genomföra djupgående analyser av kundmiljöer för att identifiera möjligheter till förbättring och innovation
* Driva innovationsprojekt och vara en nyckelspelare i att utveckla nya affärsmöjligheter
* Fungera som en teknisk rådgivare för våra kunder och internt inom organisationen
* Arbeta nära kundprojektteam för att leverera skräddarsydda lösningar som överträffar förväntningarna



  





**Kvalifikationer för att bli framgångsrik denna roll** 




  




* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av att skapa roadmaps och kundprojekt med djupa analyser
* Stark kompetens inom teknisk arkitektur och lösningar
* Förmåga att tänka innovativt och identifiera möjligheter till teknisk förbättring
* Meriterande erfarenhet av att driva innovationsprojekt och hitta nya affärsmöjligheter
* Utmärkta kommunikationsfärdigheter på svenska och engelska
* Svenskt medborgarskap



  





 På CGI får du möjlighet att arbeta i en dynamisk och mångsidig miljö där din kompetens och passion för teknik kommer att uppskattas och belönas. Vi erbjuder konkurrenskraftiga förmåner, möjligheter till personlig och professionell utveckling samt en stimulerande arbetsplats där innovation och samarbete står i fokus.
 



 Om du är redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär och bli en del av ett framgångsrikt team, skicka in din ansökan idag och bli en del av CGI:s spännande resa mot digital förvandling och innovation!
 



 Ansök genom att skicka ditt CV och personligt brev så snart som möjligt då vi löpande går igenom ansökningar och vill tillsätta rollen omgående.
 



 Har du frågor kring rollen kan du kontakta anställande chef Jenny Thernström Gärtner, Director Consulting Delivery på jenny.thernstromgartner@cgi.com
 



 CGI - Your Partner of Choice in Digital Transformation
 



  





**Låt oss som ägare omvandla verklig insikt till handling – tillsammans.** 




 Livet på CGI bygger på ägande, lagarbete, respekt och tillhörighet. Tillsammans med oss kommer du att kunna nå din fulla potential.
 



 Du är inbjuden att ta ägandeskap redan från första dagen i vårt arbete med att förverkliga vår dröm om att skapa en arbetsmiljö där vi trivs med att arbeta tillsammans och bidrar till framgången för vårt företag. Det är därför vi kallar oss CGI Partners snarare än anställda. Vi drar nytta av vår kollektiva framgång och tillsammans får vi möjlighet att aktivt forma vår företagsstrategi och inriktning.
 



 Ditt arbete skapar värde. Du kommer att vara med att utveckla innovativa lösningar och bygga relationer med medarbetare och kunder samtidigt som du får tillgång till globala möjligheter att skala upp dina idéer, omfamna nya möjligheter och dra nytta av gedigen bransch- och teknikexpertis.
 



 Du kommer att forma din karriär tillsammans med ett företag som är byggt för att växa och bestå. Du får stöd av ledare som bryr sig om din hälsa och ditt välbefinnande och ger dig möjligheter att fördjupa dina kunskaper och vidga dina vyer.
 



 Bli en del en av världens största leverantörer av IT- och affärskonsulttjänster.

title: Inside Account Executive (Nordics)
description:
MongoDB’s mission is to empower innovators to create, transform, and disrupt industries by unleashing the power of software and data. We enable organizations of all sizes to easily build, scale, and run modern applications by helping them modernize legacy workloads, embrace innovation, and unleash AI. Our industry-leading developer data platform, MongoDB Atlas, is the only globally distributed, multi-cloud database and is available in more than 115 regions across AWS, Google Cloud, and Microsoft Azure. Atlas allows customers to build and run applications anywhere—on premises, or across cloud providers. With offices worldwide and over 175,000 new developers signing up to use MongoDB every month, it’s no wonder that leading organizations, like Samsung and Toyota, trust MongoDB to build next-generation, AI-powered applications.
   

  

 The Inside Account Executive role focuses exclusively on formulating and executing a sales strategy within MongoDB’s most strategic accounts, closing net new workloads and expanding MongoDB’s footprint.
   

  

 We are looking to speak to candidates who are based in Dublin or Stockholm for our hybrid working model.
   

  

 What you will be doing
   

  

* Proactively identify, qualify and close a sales pipeline within MongoDB’s most Strategic Accounts
* Drive product adoption in LOPs/BUs you own in the account, upsells / cross sells by cultivating strategic relationships with executives and multi-level champions, aligning to their key initiatives and long term goals
* Collaborate cross-functionally with Customer Success, Professional Services, Marketing, Product, and the internal sales ecosystem to drive customer adoption and satisfaction
* Meet and exceed quarterly quotas on NWLs, NARR, and PS
* Invest in your self-development, focusing on the skills and attributes that will make you successful in your core role and set you up for future success


 What you will bring to the table
   

  

* Min 1.5 to 2 years B2B sales experience in a quota carrying closing role, or Strategic Account-based selling experience
* Experience selling complex Saas and/or Cloud products/services
* A proven track record of overachievement through generating your own pipeline and hitting sales targets
* Knowledge of the Nordic market is an important plus
* Energetic, upbeat, entrepreneurial, tenacious teammate. Possess a strong desire to be successful
* Ability to articulate the business value of complex enterprise technology both in verbal and written forms
* Passionate about growing your career in the largest and fastest growing market in software (database) through constant development of sales and tech skills


 Language(s)
   

  

* Preference for:
+ Swedish (native / fluent) and English (Fluent)


 What we will bring to the table
   

  

* Opportunity to work with and learn from MongoDB’s most talented and experienced Account Executives.
* Internal mentor and buddy program cross-departmentally
* Clear and defined career path to EAE
* Uncapped commissions’


 Location(s)
   

  

* Preference for
+ EMEA: Stockholm, Dublin
+ Willing to be flexible based on level of experience if employee is already operating in a remote capacity


 To drive the personal growth and business impact of our employees, we’re committed to developing a supportive and enriching culture for everyone. From employee affinity groups, to fertility assistance and a generous parental leave policy, we value our employees’ wellbeing and want to support them along every step of their professional and personal journeys. Learn more about what it’s like to work at MongoDB, and help us make an impact on the world!
   

  

 MongoDB is committed to providing any necessary accommodations for individuals with disabilities within our application and interview process. To request an accommodation due to a disability, please inform your recruiter.
   

  

 MongoDB is an equal opportunities employer.

title: Manager for Software Lead Engineering at ABB Marine & Ports
description:
**Manager for Software Lead Engineering at ABB Marine & Ports**
===============================================================

#### **At ABB, we are dedicated to addressing global challenges. Our core values: care, courage, curiosity, and collaboration - combined with a focus on diversity, inclusion, and equal opportunities - are key drivers in our aim to empower everyone to create sustainable solutions. That's our story. Make it your story.**

### **This position reports to**


Senior Engineering Manager

### **Your role and responsibilities**


Are you ready to lead a dynamic team in the cutting-edge world of Marine and Ports technology at ABB Process Automation? As the Manager for Software Lead Engineering, you'll head a talented team of Software Lead Engineers, coaching and developing them as they drive innovation and deliver world-class, high-quality solutions to our customers worldwide. In this role you will be part of the Ports business line within the Marine and Ports division that is specialized in advanced automation and information systems for all types of container and bulk cargo handling cranes, as well as OCR and electrical systems for container terminals. Here you will get the opportunity to oversee engineering projects from start to finish, from early sales support to successful customer handover and after-sales service. Your leadership will ensure that we meet our commitments on time, within budget, and in compliance with contract, safety, and quality standards. This role is based in Västerås and reports to the Global Engineering Manager. Examples of responsibilities include: • Collaborate closely with customers and project management to craft innovative technical solutions, leveraging feedback to improve performance and customer satisfaction. • As part of the Engineering management team, you’ll be responsible for system delivery, including application design and technical support for cutting-edge crane and terminal automation systems. • Ensure your team of Software Lead Engineers is well-resourced and empowered to succeed, including planning and allocating resources effectively. • Oversee risk and opportunity assessments, driving action plans to enhance project outcomes. • Lead continuous improvement initiatives, optimizing processes, policies, and procedures for greater efficiency. • Assist in budget allocation for the Design and Engineering department, driving business performance and growth. We offer an international and dynamic working environment where our business delivers advanced technology in large projects across the world in a customer-oriented and highly globalized industry. If this sounds like something for you, read more about requirements and how to apply below!

### **Qualifications for the role**

* 3-5 years of experience in software development, with a track record as a manager or project manager within industrial automation or a related field.
* A Master’s or Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering, Mechatronic Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field.
* Strong knowledge of engineering techniques, processes, and tools, with a focus on system-oriented development.
* A commitment to workplace safety and a proactive approach to safe work practices.
* High self-motivation and curiosity, with a passion for learning about emerging technologies.
* Proven leadership skills, with a collaborative, solution-oriented mindset and excellent communication abilities in both writing and speaking.
* Given the international nature of our work, fluency in written and spoken English is essential. Swedish or other additional language skills would be a strong advantage.

### **More about us**


ABB Marine & Ports designs and develops intelligent terminal automation solutions and services for container and bulk cargo handling as well as world-leading technologies that are driving the evolution of sustainable shipping. Our automation and electrical solutions are making port and terminal operations safer, greener and more productive. ABB Marine & Ports operates in 26 countries and has 2,000 employees. title: Mechatronics ECU Software/Lead Engineer
description:
**Can you engineer a brighter tomorrow?**


It’s crystal clear: the actions we take in the next few years will significantly impact our future. At Volvo Cars, we embrace change. We’re committed to transforming the automotive industry and leading in electrification. For this, we’re seeking out more creative minds to shape that future. Don’t miss this opportunity to create your tomorrow.

  


**Where you will belong**

Within the department Deceleration & Steering we develop Brake- and Steering- systems for future car models and continuously improve our current models. We are now looking for our next lead engineer with the responsibility to implement (together with supplier) the Software for the steering gear in our next generation vehicles.  



This assignment will involve collaboration both with internal and external partners and will require high communication and project lead skills. A high technical interest in embedded SW is required. As well as an overall understanding of the steering system including Mechanical and Electronics.

  

  

**Assignment and Scope**

  


The purpose of Volvo Cars’ Steering department is to create the best Steering system to our customers when it comes to Safety, Sustainability and Steering Feel.

  


The responsibility/ownership of implementing a new steering gear in our next generation vehicles will require high coordination/collaboration skills and very high understanding for the steering system and its impact on the rest of the car.

  


The Steering Gear in our next generation vehicles is developed by a full-service supplier. The status of the program today is that we are in the implementation phase of our two first vehicles.

  


**Deliverables and responsibilities**

  


* Develop and continuously improve the quality of the steering system according to VCC procedures.
* Follow the technical/logical Plan for the competence area and VPP (volvo project plan)
* Together with system architects, principal engineer and attribute team draw up specifications and requirements for the component and communicate them to potential suppliers with proper documentation.
* Work in close collaboration with


	+ Attribute leaders (safety, vehicle dynamics, etc.)
	+ Manufacturing
	+ External Suppliers
	+ Etc.
* Define test plans, perform acceptance and integration tests and review test results
* Ensure the work is delivered as per specified acceptance criteria and definition
* Project management - Drive and secure quality, cost and timeplan

**Experience and background**

We believe you have passion for SW with several years of hands on experience in SW development and you are eager to develop and continuously improve the quality of the architecture for the steering system according to VCC procedures.


* You have a M.Sc. in Controls and Mechatronics, Electronical or Computer Science Engineering or equal.
* You are fluent in English (spoken and written) and have a driving license (B) and drives on a regular basis.
* More than 5 years of hands-on experience in the following


	+ Engineering documentation (Requirements)
	+ SW Quality Assurance
	+ Project Management
	+ Supplier Management
	+ FMEA
	+ System Safety
	+ Cybersecurity
	+ You are also self-organizing and has a full knowledge and able to work independently in Volvos Product Development Processes, Systems and Tools

**Volvo Cars - Driving change together**

Volvo Cars’ success is the result of a collaborative, diverse, and inclusive working environment. Today, we are one of the most well-known and respected car brands, with around 43,000 employees across the globe. At Volvo Cars, your career is designed around your skills and aspirations, allowing you to reach your fullest potential.  



  

By 2025, we aim to sell 1.2 million cars annually, with 50 per cent being electric cars and sold directly to customers mainly through digital channels. Join us on this exciting journey as we pioneer the driving and electrification technologies of the future.
  

  

Curious about Life at Volvo Cars? Read more here  

Curious about our story? Read more here

title: Teknisk projektledare
description:
### **JOB DESCRIPTION**



Vill du vara en del av ett dynamiskt team som driver innovation och förändring inom olika branscher? Trivs du med att ha ett omväxlande jobb och skapa meningsfulla lösningar som kan förändra människors liv? Välkommen till Sigma Industry!


Som teknisk projektledare har du ansvaret för att driva och leda tekniska projekt från koncept till färdig leverans. Du arbetar nära tvärfunktionella team som inkluderar utvecklare, ingenjörer och externa leverantörer för att säkerställa att projekten levereras inom budget, på tid och med hög kvalitet. Rollen kräver ett starkt fokus på både tekniska detaljer och projektledning, där du fungerar som bryggan mellan teknik och affärsbehov.



Huvudskaliga arbetsuppgifter:



* Leda och samordna hela projektets livscykel, från planering och utveckling till implementering och uppföljning.
* Utveckla och underhålla detaljerade projektplaner, inklusive tidslinjer, resurshantering och budgetuppföljning.
* Säkerställa att tekniska lösningar möter både affärsmässiga och kundspecifika krav.
* Arbeta nära intressenter för att säkerställa att projektets mål och leveranser är tydligt definierade och uppnådda.
* Identifiera och hantera projektrelaterade risker och problem samt föreslå lämpliga åtgärdsplaner.
* Leda regelbundna statusmöten och rapportera framsteg till ledningen och andra berörda parter.
* Samarbeta med tvärfunktionella team för att säkra kvalitet och leverans av tekniska lösningar.

### **BASIC QUALIFICATIONS**



**Rollen kräver att du har:**



Teknisk ingenjörsutbildning (BSc eller MSc)



>3 års erfarenhet som projektledare och/scrum master



>4 års arbetserfarenhet sedan examen



Drivit projekt i projekts olika faser



**Meriterande:**



Certifiering inom projektledning (t.ex. PMP, Safe)



Erfarenhet från Försvar, Energi, Fordon, Medtech eller Industri



Erfarenhet av att arbeta med projektstyrningsverktyg, som exempelvis Jira samt metodologier som Agile


### **PREFERRED ADDITIONAL SKILLS, PERSONAL TRAITS AND EXPERIENCE**



Med din gedigna erfarenhet av projektledning har du en djup förståelse för vad som krävs för att nå framgång. Du har en naturlig förmåga att motivera både dig själv och ditt team, vilket gör att ni tillsammans kan ta er till nästa nivå och leverera starka resultat. Din strukturerade arbetsmetod och ditt engagemang säkerställer att projekten drivs framåt med både fokus och effektivitet.



Vi söker dig som har utmärkta kommunikationsfärdigheter och en förmåga att förmedla information tydligt och målmedvetet. Du är lyhörd för kundens behov och strävar alltid efter att leverera lösningar som skapar långsiktigt värde och säkerställer projektens framgång. Din förmåga att snabbt anpassa dig till nya kulturer och situationer samt att bygga och underhålla starka relationer är en av dina främsta styrkor. För dig är varje utmaning en möjlighet till utveckling och förbättring.



Du är orädd och driven, med ett stort intresse för konsultrollen där du kontinuerligt får möjlighet att möta nya miljöer, branscher och kontakter. Genom att ta dig an dessa utmaningar på ett lösningsorienterat och strategiskt sätt, skapar du inte bara framgång för dina projekt utan även för din egen karriär.


### **WE OFFER**



 Vi är oerhört stolta över att Sigma Industry East North Group har blivit rankad som #6 på listan: Svergies Bästa Arbetsgivare 2023 i kategorin små- till medelstora arbetsgivare. 


Hos oss står alltid konsulten i centrum, vår affär är uppbyggd kring vår förmåga att anställa och utveckla de bästa förmågorna inom våra områden.



Som privatägt bolag tittar vi inte på börskursen eller förbereder inför nästa kvartalsrapport, vi fokuserar istället på stabil och långsiktig utveckling, vilket bidrar med det samma för våra konsulter.



Utöver detta erbjuder vi:


* Förmånsprogram via vår partner Benify
* Friskvårdsbidrag
* Bonus vid tips om rekrytering eller uppdrag
* Kollektivavtal
* Aktivitet er
* Konferenser
* Med mera

### **MORE INFORMATION**

  



Mostafa Jalal,  

+46 761282009  

Mostafa.Jalal@sigma.se

Teknisk projektledare

Sigma Industry Innovation

title: Embedded SW Test Engineer - Driver Information team
description:
**Innovation starts with being curious**


At Volvo Cars, we believe that being curious and truly committed to understanding people is the key to future success. We are people who care about other people, working together to create new technologies and innovations for safe, sustainable and convenient mobility. Want to join us?

  


**Where you will belong**  

  

At Engineering you will be a key contributor to the next generation outstanding luxury cars from Volvo. Together with other engineers around the world, you and your team will create innovative human-centric car technology that makes life less complicated and more enjoyable for people. Are you interested in design and connected car technology? Do you share our passion for people, the environment and our urge to create a superior driving experience? Engineering is the place for you to prosper.

  


**What You’ll Do:**


Volvo Cars Driver Information team is seeking an experienced and motivated tester to take a key role in our software development team, responsible for the instrument cluster experience. This is not just a testing role; it’s an opportunity to lead, inspire, and drive quality assurance processes in a challenging, complex environment. You will work closely with developers, product owners, and other stakeholders to ensure that our software meets the highest standards of quality. You will be part of a great team, working with cutting edge technologies and unreal engine.

  


**Your main responsibilities will include:**

  


* **Test Development & Execution:** Collaborate with your team to develop and execute automated tests, writing test code to verify the driver information functions for current and future vehicle platforms.
* **System Verification:** Plan, lead, and perform verification/validation at the system, component, and software levels, including in rigs and complete vehicles.
* **Test Methodology:** Innovate and develop new test methods and tools for automated testing, ensuring alignment with requirements.
* **Analysis & Communication:** Analyze test results and work with stakeholders to drive improvements and ensure the highest safety standards.
* **Technical Leadership:** Participate in technical discussions, offer insights, and support your team in achieving project milestones. Your expertise will be integral to our success.
* **Problem Solving:** Troubleshoot, fault trace, and debug issues to ensure our systems meet Volvo’s high safety standards.
* **Environment Improvement:** Continuously evaluate and enhance our test environments to meet the needs of future vehicle platforms.

**What you could bring**


We are currently looking for two motivated SW/System Test Engineers to join the team. We believe that you will bring an high understanding and interest for system safety and high prioritized quality.

  


**Technical Expertise:**


* Proficient in SW/System Testing and continuous integration/continuous delivery (CI/CD)
* Degree in Computer Science, Mechatronics, Electronics, or a related field.
* Automotive Knowledge:
* Strong understanding of vehicle electrical architecture and communication protocols (CAN, Ethernet, LIN).
* Knowledge in diagnostics (UDS, DoIP), SWDL, bootloaders, AUTOSAR and System Safety and ISO26262 standard knowledge.
* European driving licence B

  

  

**Preferred Experience:**


* Experience with in-vehicle testing and log file collection.
* Proficiency in programming languages like Python and C++
* Experience with tools such as PyTest, Robot Framework
* Familiarity with Linux, Git, and Gerrit.

Experience with engineering tools such as SystemWeaver.  
* 

**Who are we?**


Everything we do starts with people. Our purpose is to provide freedom to move, in a personal, sustainable and safe way. We are committed to simplifying our customers’ lives by offering better technology solutions that improve their impact on the world and bringing the most advanced mobility innovations to protect them, their loved ones and the people around them.

  

  

Volvo Cars’ continued success is the result of a collaborative, diverse, and inclusive working environment. The people of Volvo Cars are committed to making a difference in our world. Today, we are one of the most well-known and respected car brands, with over 40,000 employees across the globe. We believe in bringing out the best in each other and harnessing the true power of people. At Volvo Cars your career is designed around your talents and aspirations so you can reach your full potential. Join us on a journey of a lifetime as we create safety, autonomous driving and electrification technologies of tomorrow.  

  

Curious about Life at Volvo Cars? Read more here  

Curious about our story? Read more here
